review: Love my Amazon firestick! I watch tv on my time with no commercials! Fantastic!!
author: Mr. Steven McBride

review: I was under the impression there were free movies to watch but nothing was free. You need to pay and subscribe to all the movies/shows. I tried the Apple TV and they have free movies. Disappointed.
author: Michellebayarea

review: Love the Fire stick for streaming live TV that my cable company doesn't/won't carry.
author: Stephen Ball

review: Love this new addition to my home entertainment. Very user friendly love it
author: E. Crabbe "shoe lady"

review: Fire stick is fantastic. We own a Chrome, which is good, but the Fire Stick is so much faster, has a remote, and the apps are great. Movies load up in a flash. The screen interface is so easy to use and see what is on. I would recommend this to all of my friends. Cut the cable and go Fire Stick!
author: T. Reid
